trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um controlo de editor que permite aos utilizadores finais editar várias propriedades de interface (IU) do utilizador num associados <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the appearance of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de AppearanceEditorPart é um controlo de editor que deriva a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e é utilizado para editar as propriedades que afetam o aspeto de um associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>ou outro controlo de servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart control enables end users to edit several UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de AppearanceEditorPart permite aos utilizadores finais editar várias propriedades de IU de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The type of control that appears in the page to edit each property value is listed in the adjacent cell of the following table.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de controlo que aparece na página para editar a cada valor de propriedade é listado na célula adjacente da tabela seguinte.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Control used to edit property| |--------------|-----------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set the text for the title.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select what type of title-and-border option is used.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the direction that content flows on the page.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set a number for the height, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the units.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set a number for the height, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the units.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is used to indicate whether the control is hidden.| The AppearanceEditorPart control becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Utilizado para editar a propriedade de controlo | |--------------|-----------------------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>| Um controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>é utilizado para definir o texto do título. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>| Um controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>é utilizado para selecionar o tipo de opção do título e limite que é utilizado. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>| Um controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>é utilizado para selecionar a direção que o fluxo do conteúdo na página. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>| Um controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>é utilizado para definir um número para a altura e um controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>é utilizado para selecionar as unidades. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>| Um controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>é utilizado para definir um número para a altura e um controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>é utilizado para selecionar as unidades. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>| Um controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>é utilizado para indicar se o controlo está oculto. | O controlo de AppearanceEditorPart fica visível apenas quando uma página de peças Web está em modo de edição e quando específico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo foi selecionado para edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de AppearanceEditorPart, como todos os outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controla, reside num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>zona só pode conter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos não podem ser colocados em qualquer outro tipo de zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class has a minimal set of properties.
trans-unit.target: A classe de AppearanceEditorPart tem um conjunto mínimo de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A> property is used to get or set a string that is displayed as a title when the control is visible.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A>propriedade é utilizada para obter ou definir uma cadeia que é apresentada como um título quando o controlo está visível.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A> property sets the inherited property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control, so that the default control that receives the focus within the AppearanceEditorPart control is the same as the default in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A>propriedade define a propriedade herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controlar, para que o controlo de predefinido que recebe o foco do controlo de AppearanceEditorPart é o mesmo que a predefinição na base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class also has two important methods.
trans-unit.target: A classe de AppearanceEditorPart também tem dois métodos importantes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method overrides the base method from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>método substitui o método base da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control it is editing and assigning them to the fields in the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Este método é essencial porque permite obter os valores de propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo é editar e atribuir-lhes para os campos no controlo de editor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method is also important, because it takes the values set by the user in the editing controls, and updates those property values on the control being edited.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>método também é importante, porque demora os valores definidos pelo utilizador nos controlos de edição e atualiza esses valores de propriedade no controlo a ser editado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: In most cases the AppearanceEditorPart control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:appearanceditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos o AppearanceEditorPart controlo deve ser utilizado no formato de persistência de página por declarar um `<asp:appearanceditorpart>` elemento dentro de um `<zonetemplate>` elemento, que por sua vez está contido por um `<asp:editorzone>` elemento numa página Web.

trans-unit.source: To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Para editar outras propriedades e o comportamento das <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos, pode utilizar outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos fornecidos com o conjunto de controlo de peças Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>.
trans-unit.target: Estes controlos incluem o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos devem fornecer a maioria das funcionalidades de edição necessárias para editar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlos, mas também pode criar um controlo personalizado editor por herdar da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>tópico de descrição geral de classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the AppearanceEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para melhorar a acessibilidade, o controlo de AppearanceEditorPart é composto dentro de um `<fieldset>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the AppearanceEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: O `<fieldset>` elemento agrupa o conjunto de controlos utilizados para edição no controlo AppearanceEditorPart relacionado e facilita a navegação separadores entre esses controlos para o visual (por exemplo, comum browsers) e os agentes de utilizador e orientado para reconhecimento de voz (por exemplo, o software de leitura de ecrã).

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Acessibilidade markup composto por predefinição para este controlo pode não em conformidade com normas de acessibilidade, tais como as diretrizes de prioridade 1 Web conteúdo acessibilidade diretrizes 1.0 (WCAG).

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre o suporte de acessibilidade para este controlo, consulte [controlos do ASP.NET e acessibilidade](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Guarda os valores de uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> controlo para as propriedades correspondentes no associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges é um método crítico num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: É denominado quando o utilizador clica num botão que representa um OK ou um verbo aplicar na interface de edição de utilizador (IU).

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Objetivo do método é para guardar os valores de um utilizador definiu num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controlo para as propriedades correspondentes no associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O controlo associado é referenciado no herdado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set the following properties on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges tenta definir as seguintes propriedades no associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ação de guardar valores do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> controlar para as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo for bem-sucedida; caso contrário (se ocorrer um erro), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An error occurs when setting the value for any of the following properties on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is being edited: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden*>
trans-unit.target: Ocorre um erro ao definir o valor para qualquer uma das seguintes propriedades no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlo que está a ser editado: <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *><>*>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property inherited from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a propriedade base herdada de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controlo para ocultar a propriedade de designers e impedir que sejam afetados por temas.

trans-unit.source: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.
trans-unit.target: Embora seja público, esta propriedade é utilizada para composição predefinida deste controlo e não se destina a ser chamado a partir do código do programador.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não pode ser definida por temas ou temas de folha de estilo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>e [temas ASP.NET e das máscaras de](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control that receives the default focus in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o ID de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"> </xref> controlo que recebe o foco de predefinição num <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and assigns them to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores de propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlar e atribui-las para associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é um método crítico num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método da classe base, obtém os valores atuais de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar e atualiza os controlos de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controlo com esses valores para um utilizador pode editá-los.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é chamado sempre que os valores existentes na associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo pode ter sido alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controlo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona que contém o controlo chama o método de SyncChanges, para que os valores existentes no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controlo sempre estão sincronizados com os valores existentes na associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Outro cenário onde o método de SyncChanges é chamado é quando uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlo introduz o modo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um título para o controlo de editor.

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade de título é apresentado na barra de título de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>controlar quando o controlo está visível no modo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controlo está declarado numa página, pode definir um valor para o `Title` atributo.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kinds of properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: Se não fornecer um valor para o título, é utilizado um valor específicas do idioma predefinido para descrever os tipos de propriedades neste controlo permite aos utilizadores editar.

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que é utilizada como o título do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é um nome de controlo calculada fornecido pelo conjunto de controlo de peças Web.
